entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.
